<!-- Please fill out the template below. -->

Checklist of required entries:

- [ ] `url` is specified
- [ ] `title` is specified
- [ ] `description` is specified

**Note**: 
- The thumbnail can be a url to a direct image link.

```yaml
---
url: ''
thumbnail: ''
title: ''
description: ''
authors:
  - name: ''
    affiliation: ''
    affiliation_url: ''
    email: ''
  - name: ''
    affiliation: ''
    affiliation_url: ''
    email: ''
---

```
